meanings.sent1: The toothpaste extrudes from the tube easily.
meanings.sent2: The machine extrudes plastic to create new shapes.
meanings.sent3: The silly clown extrudes confetti from his nose.
meanings.sent4: Her anger extrudes like steam from a boiling pot.
meanings.sent5: The volcano extrudes lava in a fiery display.

meanings.definition: To shape or form by forcing through a die
meanings.sent1: The playdough extrudes through the mold to make different shapes.
meanings.sent2: The factory extrudes metal rods for construction purposes.
meanings.sent3: The chef extrudes pasta dough to create unique noodles.
meanings.sent4: His creativity extrudes through every piece of art he makes.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor extrudes clay into intricate sculptures.
